description: '''Matthew Peter DeLuca''' (born April 4, 2005), known professionally as '''Lil Mabu''', is an American [[Rapping|rapper]] from [[Manhattan]], New York City. He first gained recognition in 2020 for his song "Miss Me", and became best known for his 2023 single "[[Mathematical Disrespect]]", which entered the top 50 of the [[Billboard Hot 100|''Billboard'' Hot 100]].
